attributes.action: Stop local councils using ageism legislation to deny OAPs the usual subsidy on adult learning classes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Newcastle upon Tyne adult education Department has ended the subsidy on fees given forerly to Pensioners.
They cite the reason as being advised that it is against ageism legislation to give the subsidy.
I say that if this is so, then the Government is guilty of ageism in pressing for free travel on buses for Pensioners.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
